entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Westlock
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:17 PM MST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow mixed with freezing rain. Low zero except minus 10 in a few localities.
entry.summary: Periods of snow mixed with freezing rain ending before morning then cloudy. Low zero except minus 10 in a few localities. Forecast issued 10:17 PM MST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Clearing. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. High plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 10:17 PM MST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening. Forecast issued 10:17 PM MST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Cloudy. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. High plus 4. Forecast issued 10:17 PM MST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 60 percent chance of showers. Low minus 5. Forecast issued 10:17 PM MST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 7.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High 7. Forecast issued 10:17 PM MST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Cloudy periods. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 10:17 PM MST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High 7.
entry.summary: Sunny. Windy. High 7. Forecast issued 10:17 PM MST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 7. Forecast issued 10:17 PM MST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High zero.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High zero. Forecast issued 10:17 PM MST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 1.
